fields.name: ContactMethodTextDisplay
fields.fieldText: Note: Remember to call the customer first, and leave a voicemail if possible. Please select the 'Email' option below if the customer is unavailable.

fields.name: CommunicationSelection
fields.fieldText: Select a contact method for this customer

fields.name: ImportantNote
fields.fieldText: Note: Clicking 'Next' will send an email to the customers email address ({!CustomerEmail}).

fields.name: SuccessMsg
fields.fieldText: Your email was successfully sent!

fields.name: DisplayEndCall
fields.fieldText:
Thanks again for your business and taking the time to speak with me, if you have any questions please feel free to call me.


﻿Reminder: Take this opportunity to speak with the customer about our Winterization services. Refer to the "Post-Season Follow-Up Call Survey" widget below.

fields.name: DisplayGreeting
fields.fieldText:
﻿Hello, this is {!UserFirstName} from Legend Boats {!WarehouseID}. May I speak with {!CustomerFirstName}?



Is this a good time for you?

fields.name: Do_you_have_any_questions_on_the_operation_of_the_boat
fields.fieldText: Do you have any questions on the operation of the boat?

fields.name: Did_all_the_equipment_operate_ok
fields.fieldText: Did all the equipment operate ok?

fields.name: DisplayPurposeOfCall1
fields.fieldText:
I'm calling to check with you on your new {!ProductName}.


Have you had a chance to use the boat?



How did your first day on the boat go?



Where did you go?



Who went?



﻿What did you do?


  • Fishing
  • Skiing/Boarding/Surfing
  • Cruising
  • Entertaining
  • High Performance
  • Swimming
  • Scuba
  • Family Fun

fields.name: DisplayRateExperience
fields.fieldText:
On a scale from 1 - 10, with 10 being the best, how would you rate your first day on the new boat?


  • "10" Great! What made it a 10?
  • "1-9" May I ask what made it a (number)?

fields.name: DisplayService
fields.fieldText: I'll get with the service department and have them contact you. Do you want them to call/email/or text you?

fields.name: DisplaySocial
fields.fieldText:
Are you on Facebook or Instagram?


Checkout our pages and please post pictures of your great times on the boat. I'll be looking out for them!

fields.name: DisplaySuccess
fields.fieldText: The application has finished successfully

fields.name: DisplayWelcome
fields.fieldText: Click 'Next' to proceed with the Customer Experience Follow-Up Script

textTemplates.name: EmailBody
textTemplates.text:
Hi {!CustomerFirstName},
It's {!UserFirstName} with Legend Boats {!WarehouseID}. I called you today to check up on your new {!ProductName} and caught your voicemail.
We are hoping that you have had a chance to give your new boat a try and all went well. I would love to hear all about your first day or days on the water and would also like to know if you have had any questions or difficulties with the boat’s operation.
Please give me a call, reply to this email, or send me a quick text when you get a chance so I can help you with any questions you have with the boat.
I look forward to speaking with you and helping you with your good times on the water!
Sincerely, {!UserFirstName} {!UserLastName} {!UserPhone}
